attributes.action: Recognise the existance of the state of Palestine. UK has stop all economic, military and financial support to Israel.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Recognise the existance of the state of Palestine. UK has stop all economic, military and financial support to Israel till it recognises the state of Palestine with its international borders. 
Support Palestine which is Free and Independant. Condemn The occupation and all its western support.

rejection.details:
There is already a petition on the existence of Palestine:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/FreePalestine
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
